LanguageData.Silver.label: silver
LanguageData.Silver.description: This metal is mostly used as a commodity currency. It can also be used for making attractive decorations.
LanguageData.Gold.label: gold
LanguageData.Gold.description: The most seductive metal of them all. Millions have died in attempting to feed the endless human thirst for gold. This soft metal is little use on its own, but is strikingly beautiful and very rare.
LanguageData.Steel.label: steel
LanguageData.Steel.description: An iron-carbon metal alloy used for building structures, tools, and weapons.
LanguageData.Plasteel.label: plasteel
LanguageData.Plasteel.description: Advanced spacer tech structural material. Plasteel is extremely strong due to its unique molecular structure.
LanguageData.WoodLog.label: wood
LanguageData.WoodLog.description: Wood from trees or other fibrous plants. Useful for building structures, weapons, and even simple prosthetics. A raw stick of wood can be used as a weapon in a pinch.
LanguageData.Uranium.label: uranium
LanguageData.Uranium.description: An extremely hard, dense metal. While it is best known for its use powering nuclear reactors, its physical properties also make it excellent in some roles as a tool, weapon, or armor.
LanguageData.Cloth.label: cloth
LanguageData.Synthread.label: synthread
LanguageData.Synthread.description: Spacer-tech synthetic fabric designed for making ordinary clothes. It is soft, light, strong, and insulates well.
LanguageData.DevilstrandCloth.label: devilstrand
LanguageData.DevilstrandCloth.description: Fabric spun from microfibers extracted from silk-producing Devilstrand mushrooms. Very tough, but insulates no better than cloth.
LanguageData.Hyperweave.label: hyperweave
LanguageData.Hyperweave.description: High-tech nano-fibers woven into sheets. It is somewhat heavy, but is incredibly difficult to break. The secrets of its production are known only to the most advanced glitterworld cultures.
LanguageData.RawHops.label: hops
LanguageData.RawHops.description: Raw hops. A flavoring and preserving agent that is necessary for making beer.
LanguageData.RawPotatoes.label: potatoes
LanguageData.RawCorn.label: corn
LanguageData.RawCorn.description: Raw corn. Nice to eat, even when raw.
LanguageData.RawRice.label: rice
LanguageData.RawBerries.label: berries
LanguageData.RawBerries.description: Assorted berries. Nice to eat, even when raw.
LanguageData.RawAgave.label: agave fruit
LanguageData.HerbalMedicine.label: herbal medicine
LanguageData.HerbalMedicine.description: A pack of herbal concoctions typically extracted from the xerigium plant. Less potent than industrial pharmaceuticals.
LanguageData.Medicine.label: medicine
LanguageData.Medicine.description: Medical staff use these supplies to heal the wounded.
LanguageData.GlitterworldMedicine.label: glitterworld medicine
LanguageData.GlitterworldMedicine.description: Advanced medical supplies from a high-tech glitterworld.
LanguageData.ArtilleryShell.label: artillery shell
